title: Who We Are ?
paragraph1: First Ambulance is a highly regarded emergency medical services provider based in Malaysia. With an outstanding track record of over two decades, we have proudly served our local community, strictly following best practices and industry standards. Our extensive fleet and expertise allow us to offer comprehensive turnkey solutions for both private and public services. With operational hubs strategically located throughout the country, we efficiently handle the workload necessary to support our nationâ€™s healthcare needs.
paragraph2: At First Ambulance, our commitment to excellence is upheld through our adherence to an ISO 9001 certified management system. This ensures consistent quality across all our operations and keeps us in line with leading global guidelines. We take pride in providing top-tier services in every aspect of our organization.
